title: Band
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: twined wool ground with wool pile
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Vertical strip of eleven rectangular vertical panels containing bird motifs. The nine top panels contain stylized standing bird with two-toed feet and S-curved tail, in left profile; the two lower panels a spotted angular S-shape terminating with bird head at both ends. In blues, olive green, red, white, yellow, brownish mauve woolen pile on twined ground in broad horizontal bands of brown, tans, beige wool.

exhibitions.title: Extreme Textiles: Designing for High Performance

tombstone.epitaph:
Band.
